title: can anybody help?
content:
Can anybody please help me?

what is this font?

very much appreciated ...  
Thank you

| --- | --- |
| [07\_11\_f0\_jaarverslag.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312105107/http:/typophile.com/files/07_11_f0_jaarverslag.png) | 6.67 KB |

author: Ashleyco

comments.content:
I think these numbers look like [Adobe Utopia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312105107/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/utopia_expert/?sample_text=0607&sample_size=60), but I can’t see the lettering well enough to confirm the ID.

- Mike Yanega
